roleset.name: shake

example.name: Don't forget about prd for verbs

roleset.note: Based on Sharp and Thyme data. Comparison to tremble.01. Tremble.01 is a member of VN classes modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3 and body_internal_states-40.6. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: Natural Disaster: minor earthquake
roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor.

example.name: args 2, LOC, ADJ
example.text: ...an unusually large tremor of M5.9 in the islands of the Azores, while an intra- plate earthquake in central Russia was also noteworthy at M5.3.
example.arg: in the islands of the Azores
